name: AS_CO_DSP_warningBanner
description: Rule to display a warning message
sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_DSP_zINTERNAL_styledBanner(
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  label: ri!label,
  secondaryLabel: ri!secondaryLabel,
  acknowledgementSaveInto: ri!acknowledgementSaveInto,
  style: "WARN",
  icon: cons!AS_CO_ICON_WARNING,
  iconColor: cons!AS_CO_HEX_WARNING,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)
